pullRequest.title: Simplify loading columns into cache in CachingJdbcClient
pullRequest.bodyText:
Utilize guava cache.get(key, loader) instead of custom way of loading.
loader is able to handle external context, which addresses constraint:
columns depend on session and session cannot be used in cache key
This pr is a small step toward merging #6067

nodes.bodyText:
Use built-in thread safe cache loading for columns

The commit may be read as if the previous code was not thread safe, while i think it was.
am i missing something?
if it is just a refactor, then perhaps name the commit as such, eg
Simplify loading columns into cache in CachingJdbcClient

Utilize `cache.get` with a loader, to simplify control flow.

commit.message:
Simplify loading columns into cache in CachingJdbcClient

Utilize `cache.get` with a loader, to simplify control flow.
loader is able to handle external context, which addresses constraint:
columns depend on session and session cannot be used in cache key
